name: Timolol Maleate
warningsAndPrecautions:
Timolol Maleate Tablets, USP are available containing 5 mg, 10 mg and 20 mg of timolol maleate, USP.
                  The 5 mg tablets are green, round, flat-faced, unscored tablets debossed with M over 55 on one side of the tablet and blank on the other side. They are available as follows:
                  NDC 0378-0055-01bottles of 100 tablets
                  The 10 mg tablets are green, round, flat-faced, scored tablets debossed with M above the score and 221 below the score on one side of the tablet and blank on the other side. They are available as follows:
                  NDC 0378-0221-01bottles of 100 tablets
                  The 20 mg tablets are green, capsule-shaped, scored tablets debossed with M to the left of the score and 715 to the right of the score on one side of the tablet and blank on the other side. They are available as follows:
                  NDC 0378-0715-01bottles of 100 tablets
                  
                     Store at 20째 to 25째C (68째 to 77째F). [See USP Controlled Room Temperature.]
                  
                  
                     Protect from light.
                  
                  Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container as defined in the USP using a child-resistant closure.
                  
                     Mylan Pharmaceuticals Inc.
                     Morgantown, WV 26505
                  Revised: 7/2020TIM:R16
adverseReactions: Timolol maleate is contraindicated in patients with bronchial asthma or with a history of bronchial asthma, or severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (see WARNINGS); sinus bradycardia; second- and third-degree atrioventricular block; overt cardiac failure (see WARNINGS); cardiogenic shock; hypersensitivity to this product.
